reviews.headline: What people
reviews.subtitle: Real people who made better decisions after starting to use Tallify.

lucia.name: Lucia
lucia.review: I tried Excel, apps, Notion. Everything worked, but nothing helped me decide quickly. Tallify is the first thing I open when I want to know if I can spend.

martin.name: Martin
martin.review: The problem was never tracking expenses. It was not seeing the payments coming. When I started seeing that, I stopped making mistakes at the end of the month.

sofia.name: Sofia
sofia.review: Notion is amazing, but for this I got tired of building systems. Tallify comes ready-made and that's why I use it every day.

pablo.name: Pablo
pablo.review: With other tools I saw numbers. With Tallify I see if I can afford it. Sounds similar, but it's not.

carla.name: Carla
carla.review: I use Excel to close things out. I use Tallify to decide beforehand. That difference is key.

andres.name: Andres
andres.review: I was never consistent tracking everything. Still, Tallify gives me a clear idea of my balance and that's enough to decide better.

diego.name: Diego
diego.review: The first month I identified expenses I didn't even remember. I've already paid for several months of Pro just with that. And I keep finding more.

faq.headline: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Tallify

free.a: Yes, the Free plan is 100% free forever. Includes unlimited expenses and income, 10 categories, 3 payment methods, and all basic features. No credit card required.

categories.q: What if I need more than 10 categories?
categories.a: You can upgrade to the Pro plan ($9.99/mo) for unlimited categories, advanced recurring expenses, global search, and more. Pro plan pays for itself: users identify ~$250/mo in unnecessary expenses.

bank.q: Does it connect to my bank?
bank.a: No. Tallify does NOT access your bank account. You manually register your expenses. This gives you total control and works with any bank or cash.

security.a: Yes. We use Supabase (enterprise-grade infrastructure) with encryption and Row Level Security. Only you can see your data. We don't sell or share your information.

mobile.a: Perfectly. Tallify is designed mobile-first. 80% of users primarily use it from their phone. It works in any modern browser.

setup.q: How long does it take to set up?
setup.a: 5 minutes until you add your first expense. No learning curve. It's intuitive from the first use.

export.a: Yes, you can export everything and delete your account whenever you want. Your data is yours. No strings attached.
